description.text: Batch read in op1 from all devices with hash op2 of parameter op3 in op4 mode
Batch write to all devices with hash op1 to parameter op2 of value op3
Populates the stack with argument values
Battery or accumulator charge, J. Level of electricity generation by a solar panel, W.
the class of the object in the slot
Color of LED lamp, fixed beacon and LED display
1 - ignition detected, 0 - in all other cases
For reading - the level at which the elevator cabin is located, or -1 if there is no cabin. On record - sends the elevator to the specified floor.
The speed of the elevator cabin, m / tick. A negative value corresponds to downward movement, 0 to a stationary booth, a positive value to upward movement.
counter of objects passed through the export slot
Switches the filtration of the spent mixture in a durable suit.
Forces the write and multiwrite chips to transfer the current value to the hardware.
Activates harvesting in an automatic hydroponic station.
angle with respect to the Sun in degrees in the horizontal projection of the Sun onto the sensor plane
Loading the arc furnace. 0 - ore is not loaded, 1 - loaded.
counter of objects passed through the import slot
The maximum value of some equipment parameter, such as battery charge or pressure at the inlet to the combustion chamber of a jet engine. Very often present but not used.
maximum number of items in a slot

For a sorter - r/w , Int - the next output to which the object will be issued.
For a stacker - w, Trigger - unloads the accumulated packing of objects into the export slot.
Starts the process of planting a plant from the import slot in an automatic hydroponic station.
Y coordinate of the current position
Z coordinate of the current position
0 - no power or off, 1 - power on
Total electricity consumption by all devices in the network, W.
Current generation of electricity by the generator, W.
The total electricity demand of all devices in the network, W.
atmospheric pressure in the environment, kPa
The pressure in the pipeline at which the operation of active ventilation stops, kPa. Installed but not used.

For batteries - Charge/Maximum ratio.
For other devices - Setting/Maximum ratio.
total weight of ingredients in grams
The energy required for the operation of the device, W.
The current value of some hardware parameter. The type and possible values ​​depend on the hardware.
angle relative to the sun in degrees
temperature of the external atmosphere, K
The specified temperature inside the durable suit, K.
The total amount of gas inside the pipeline, mol.
speed of movement along the X coordinate
angle relative to the sun in degrees
The battery level in the slot.
Plant growth efficiency in an automatic hydroponic station. -1 if there is no plant.
Plant growth stage in automatic hydroponic station. -1 if there is no plant.
Plant health in an automatic hydroponic station. 0 - dead plant, 1 - completely healthy, -1 - no plant.
Readiness of the plant in the automatic hydroponic station for harvesting. -1 if there is no plant.
hash of the object in the slot
Pressure in the cylinder with the breathing mixture of the suit installed in the rack, kPa.
Pressure in the cylinder with the spent mixture of the suit installed in the rack, kPa.
